text: Songs for Drella is studio album by American guitarist Lou Reed and Welsh multi-instrumentalist John Cale. It was released in April 1990 on Sire Records label. == Track listing == # "Smalltown" – 2:04 # "Open House" – 4:18 # "Style It Takes" – 2:54 † # "Work" – 2:38 # "Trouble with Classicists" – 3:42 † # "Starlight" – 3:28 # "Faces and Names" – 4:12 † # "Images" – 3:31 # "Slip Away (A Warning)" – 3:05 # "It Wasn't Me" – 3:30 # "I Believe" – 3:18 # "Nobody But You" – 3:46 # "A Dream" – 6:33 † # "Forever Changed" – 4:52 † # "Hello It's Me" – 3:13 == Personnel == *Lou Reed – vocals (1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12, 15), guitar *John Cale – vocals (3, 5, 7, 13, 14), keyboards, viola Category:John Cale albums Category:Lou Reed albums Category:1990 albums
title: Songs for Drella
